down-intfs-before-sess-sync.help: List of interfaces to be turned down before session synchronization is complete.
down-intfs-before-sess-sync.name: down-intfs-before-sess-sync

peerip.help: IP address of the interface on the peer unit that is used for the session synchronization link.
peerip.name: peerip

peervd.help: VDOM that contains the session synchronization link interface on the peer unit. Usually both peers would have the same peervd.
peervd.name: peervd

custom-service.help: Only sessions using these custom services are synchronized. Use source and destination port ranges to define these custome services.
custom-service.name: custom-service

dstaddr.help: Only sessions to this IPv4 address are synchronized. You can only enter one address. To synchronize sessions for multiple destination addresses, add multiple filters.
dstaddr.name: dstaddr

dstaddr6.help: Only sessions to this IPv6 address are synchronized. You can only enter one address. To synchronize sessions for multiple destination addresses, add multiple filters.
dstaddr6.name: dstaddr6

dstintf.help: Only sessions to this interface are synchronized. You can only enter one interface name. To synchronize sessions to multiple destination interfaces, add multiple filters.
dstintf.name: dstintf

srcaddr.help: Only sessions from this IPv4 address are synchronized. You can only enter one address. To synchronize sessions from multiple source addresses, add multiple filters.
srcaddr.name: srcaddr

srcaddr6.help: Only sessions from this IPv6 address are synchronized. You can only enter one address. To synchronize sessions from multiple source addresses, add multiple filters.
srcaddr6.name: srcaddr6

srcintf.help: Only sessions from this interface are synchronized. You can only enter one interface name. To synchronize sessions for multiple source interfaces, add multiple filters.
srcintf.name: srcintf

session-sync-filter.help: Add one or more filters if you only want to synchronize some sessions. Use the filter to configure the types of sessions to synchronize.
session-sync-filter.name: session-sync-filter

slave-add-ike-routes.help: Enable/disable IKE route announcement on the backup unit.
slave-add-ike-routes.name: slave-add-ike-routes

options.help: Add IKE routes to the backup unit.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not add IKE routes to the backup unit.
options.name: disable

syncvd.help: Sessions from these VDOMs are synchronized using this session synchronization configuration.
syncvd.name: syncvd

results.help: Configure FortiGate Session Life Support Protocol (FGSP) session synchronization.
results.name: cluster-sync
